TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
1.3.8244 - Adjusted spawn rates to be higher so they spawn a lot more commonly among vanilla factions if that setting is enabled. - Added support for Nal's Facial Animation. (Thanks to Mafelusz2 for speeding that up) - Added racial hediffs to note the differences of each race from standard humans. - Race factions are now disabled by default in the faction selection screen on world generation. - Disabled verbose logging. - Minor bug fixes and stat adjustments.
Right click to dismiss update.
